title: www.apostrophiclab.com?
content:
Does anyone know how to get a hold of Fredrick Nader at Apostrophic Laboratories:

Apostrophic Laboratories, 343 Kingswood Road, Toronto, Ontario, Canada M4E 3N8

I am trying to email him about a font correction I propose to his Steinem font.

Thank you.
author: snowdrift

comments.content:
I'm trying to buy a font called "street corner". It's a free font designed by Graham Meade but i'd like to use it for commercial purposes so i'd like to pay the designer or get the all clear. Does anybody have an address or email address for Graham Meade.  
I've tried [graham@apostrophiclab.com](mailto:graham@apostrophiclab.com) but it keeps bouncing back.  
Many thanks  
brendan.

Graham Meade produces fonts at MyFonts under the company name "Typotheticals" ( [http://www.myfonts.com/browse/foundry/typotheticals/](http://web.archive.org/web/20111221030118/http:/www.myfonts.com/browse/foundry/typotheticals/ "http://www.myfonts.com/browse/foundry/typotheticals/")). No clue on how to get in touch with Frederick Nader.

For G. Meade, try this: fontype at hotmail dot com

Then ask Graham to put you in touch with Fred Nader.

Apostrophiclab?

"You will never find a more wretched hive of scum and villainy."

–Obi Wan Kenobi
Is that a broken halo you're holding Dan? :-)

\>“You will never find a more wretched hive of scum and villainy.”  
\>–Obi Wan Kenobi

How about...

"That [place](http://web.archive.org/web/20111221030118/http:/starwars.wikia.com/wiki/Dark_Side_Cave)...is strong with the dark side of the Force."  
―Yoda
Just a letter C, Nick. Just a letter C. I purchased it near Notting Hill.
